response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000 by both parties. Considering its high quality and the benefits it brings, I propose to sell it to you for $14,500. This special offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value, allowing you to enjoy significant savings while securing this exceptional item. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 14500}
